meanings.definition: Resembling a jet in speed or force.
meanings.sent1: The car raced down the highway at a jetlike speed.
meanings.sent2: The rocket soared through the sky with a jetlike force.
meanings.sent3: The cheetah moved with a jetlike speed, leaving everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her words hit me with a jetlike force, knocking me off balance.
meanings.sent5: The storm approached with a jetlike speed, darkening the sky in an instant.

meanings.definition: Moving or acting with the speed or force of a jet.
meanings.sent1: The athlete sprinted across the finish line with a jetlike speed.
meanings.sent2: The wind howled outside, sounding jetlike in its force.
meanings.sent3: The toddler ran around the playground with a jetlike speed, giggling all the way.
meanings.sent4: His anger erupted with a jetlike force, surprising everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall cascaded down the rocks with a jetlike speed, creating a mesmerizing sight.
